00054 using namespace std;

00056 
00057 void RNetMessage::read(Reader* r) throw (RDK2::ReadingException)
00058 {
00059     r->startReading(getClassName());
00060         addressees = r->readString();
00061         sender = r->readString();
00062         type = (Type) r->read_i32();
00063         socketType = (Network::NetProtocol) r->read_i32();
00064         payload = (RDK2::Object*) r->readObject();
00065     r->doneReading();
00066 }
00067 
00068 void RNetMessage::write(Writer* w) const throw (RDK2::WritingException)
00069 {
00070     if(!payload)
00071         throw WritingException("Cannot serialize RNetMessage with null payload.");
00072 
00073     w->startWriting(getClassName());
00074         w->writeString(addressees,"addressees");
00075         w->writeString(sender,"sender");
00076         w->write_i32(type,"messageType");
00077         w->write_i32(socketType,"socketType");
00078         w->writeObject(true, payload, "payload");
00079     w->doneWriting();
00080 }

00082 std::vector<Object*> RNetMessage::getTestCases() const { 
00083     RNetMessage * o = new RNetMessage();
00084     o->addressees = "Barbie BratZ";
00085     o->sender = "Gi-ai-gio";
00086     o->type = PEER_IDENTIFICATION;
00087     o->socketType = Network::TCP_IP;
00088     o->payload = new RDK2::RPrimitive::RString("Hello baby");
00089 
00090     std::vector<Object*> v;
00091     v.push_back(o);
00092     return v;
00093 }
00094 
00095 bool  RNetMessage::equals(const Object*p) const {
00096     const RNetMessage * o = dynamic_cast<const RNetMessage *>(p);
00097     return o 
00098         && (o->addressees == addressees) 
00099         && (o->sender     == sender)
00100         && (o->type       == type)
00101         && (o->socketType == socketType)
00102         && (    (!o->payload && !o->payload) 
00103                 || (o->payload && payload &&payload->equals(o->payload))
00104         );
00105 }
00106 
00107 double RNetMessage::getDelay() const {
00108     struct timeval tv;
00109     ::gettimeofday( &tv, 0 );
00110     return tv.tv_sec * 1000. + tv.tv_usec * 0.001 - timestamp;
00111 }
00112 
00113 bool RNetMessage::reset()
00114 {
00115     if(payload) {
00116         delete payload;
00117         payload = 0;
00118     }
00119     return true;
00120 }
00121 
00122 RDK2::Object* RNetMessage::clone() const
00123 {
00124     return new RNetMessage( addressees, sender, type, socketType, 
00125         payload ? payload->clone() : 0 );
00126 }
00127 
00128 // RNetMessage copy & copyconstructor method -------------------------------------------------
00129 RNetMessage::RNetMessage( const RNetMessage& _message ) :
00130     RDK2::Object(),
00131 //  Serializable(),
00132     addressees(_message.addressees),
00133     sender(_message.sender),
00134     type(_message.type), 
00135     socketType(_message.socketType) {
00136     payload =  _message.payload ? _message.payload->clone() : 0;
00137     
00138     struct timeval tv;
00139     ::gettimeofday( &tv, 0 );
00140     timestamp = tv.tv_sec * 1000. + tv.tv_usec * 0.001;
00141 }
00142 
00143 RNetMessage& RNetMessage::operator=( const RNetMessage& _message )
00144 {
00145     reset();
00146     addressees  = _message.addressees;
00147     sender     = _message.sender;
00148     type       = _message.type;
00149     socketType = _message.socketType;
00150     payload =  _message.payload ? _message.payload->clone() : 0;
00151     
00152     return *this;
00153 }
00154 
00155 RNetMessage::RNetMessage() :
00156     payload( new RString("unset message") ) {
00157     IN_DEBUG_STREAM("Creating empty RNetMessage");
00158 }
00159 
00160 // RNetMessage constructor
00161 RNetMessage::RNetMessage(   const std::string &addressees,
00162                 const std::string &sender,
00163                 Type type,
00164                 Network::NetProtocol socketType, 
00165                 const RDK2::Object* const payload)
00166 :   addressees(addressees), sender(sender), type(type), socketType(socketType), payload(payload)
00167 {
00168     OUT_DEBUG_STREAM("Creating RNetMessage: to '"<<addressees<<"' from '"<<sender<<"'");
00169     struct timeval tv;
00170     ::gettimeofday( &tv, 0 );
00171     timestamp = tv.tv_sec * 1000. + tv.tv_usec * 0.001;
00172 }
00173 
00174 // RNetMessage destructor --------------------------------------------------------------------
00175 RNetMessage::~RNetMessage()
00176 {
00177 //  std::cout<<"deleting: ";
00178 //  save( std::cout );
00179 //  std::cout<<endl;
00180     if ( payload ) delete payload;
00181 }

00184 const std::string& RNetMessage::getAddressees() const
00185 {
00186     return addressees;

00189 const std::string& RNetMessage::getSender() const
00190 {
00191     IN_DEBUG_STREAM("Returning Sender: "<<sender);
00192     return sender;

00201 {

00205 const RDK2::Object* RNetMessage::getPayload() const

00210 static size_t charcount( int i ) {
00211     return (i==0) ? 1 : (size_t)log10f(i) + 1;
00212 }
00213 
00214 std::size_t RNetMessage::getOverheadSize(   const std::string &addressees, const std::string &sender,
00215                 Type type, Network::NetProtocol socketType ) {
00216     static size_t BaseOverHead = getBaseHeadSize();
00217     return BaseOverHead + addressees.size() + sender.size() + charcount( type ) + charcount( socketType );
00218 }
00219 
00220 std::size_t RNetMessage::getBaseHeadSize() {
00221     std::string empty;
00222     std::ostringstream oss;
00223     oss << "<RNetMessage addressees=\"\" ";
00224     oss << "sender=\"\" ";
00225     oss << "type=\"\" socketType=\"\">";
00226     oss <<"</RNetMessage>";
00227     std::string result = oss.str();
00228     RDK_DEBUG_STREAM("Base overhead computed now, result: "<<result.size());
00229     RDK_DEBUG_STREAM("String generated is: " << result );
00230     
00231     return oss.str().size();
00232 }
